title: Maiming Strike
content:
Maiming Strike Actions Possibly Maims your target. They can't move. Flying creatures can't be Maimed. 2 turns Melee Con Save Attack Roll Short Rest Action

Possibly Maims your target. They can't move. Flying creatures can't be Maimed.

Melee Con Save Attack Roll Short Rest

Maiming Strike is a Weapon Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Maiming Strike gives you a chance to Maim targets on hit. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Character
